qualityRef.title: Quality reference
qualityRef.p1: OFAG’s quality reference is its portfolio of multinational clients and leading Brazilian laboratories (see our clients), which periodically conduct audits at our facilities to support our processes and products.
qualityRef.p2: OFAG guarantees the supply of its products through certification, based on analysis results and sampling predefined with each client’s technical team. All of this is supported by Good Manufacturing Practices (G.M.P.) and ISO 9000 / FSC Certification.
